text: NYNEX Corporation /ˈnaɪnɛks/ was an American telephone company that served five states of New England (Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island and Vermont) as well as most of the state of New York from January 1, 1984, to August 14, 1997. == References == Category:American telephone companies Category:Defunct companies of the United States Category:1984 establishments in the United States Category:1997 disestablishments in the United States
title: NYNEX
